title: Rp with prepaid MasterCard giftcard
body: Are you able to buy rp with a prepaid MasterCard giftcard? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
You should have no issues completing an RP purchase with a prepaid MasterCard gift card, just be sure to register it first using the instructions on the back of the card!

Let me know if you have any questions.
